Re: comment 2

I've already fixed this in the patch I'm working on for bug 61581. I'll try to
break off this part of the change and merge it early.

I have submitted a patch for this. However, I can only reproduce this NPE in a
heavily modified branch. On my machine with the code from head, the debug tests
pass with or without the patch.

I will leave this open for now. If this NPE doesn't show up in tonight's nightly
build, it is probably fixed.
